mapper.insert: INSERT INTO putTrain(trainNum ,trainCode, trainName, trainRoomCount, trainSeatCount) VALUES(putTrain_seq.NEXTVAL ,#{trainCode}, #{trainName}, #{trainRoomCount}, #{trainSeatCount})
INSERT INTO trainSeting(roomCode, trainCode, roomNum, roomGrade, seatRow, seatColumn) VALUES(trainSeting_seq.NEXTVAL, #{trainCode}, #{roomNum}, #{roomGrade}, #{seatRow}, #{seatColumn})
mapper.select: SELECT pt.trainCode, trainName, trainRoomCount, trainSeatCount, roomCode, roomGrade FROM putTrain pt JOIN trainSeting ts ON pt.trainCode = ts.trainCode WHERE trainCode=#{trainCode}
SELECT trainCode, trainName, trainRoomCount, trainSeatCount FROM putTrain
mapper.update: UPDATE putTrain SET trainSeatCount=#{trainSeatCount} WHERE trainCode = #{trainCode}
